name: Pebbles
tagline: An easy to use yet powerful calculator app
description: An advanced calculator that helps you with complicated calculations in your homework

features.description: Perform scientific calculations with ease. Type the whole expression and evaluate result from that
Not every math needs to be rocket science but like the professor, you can find out how fast rocket goes or how much fuel it will take
Statistically analyse a large linear set of data, see the trends, average, deviations, etc
Wanna play with numbers the way a computer understands them?
Find how many days until your next birthday or what date is the next summer holiday
Convert any quantity from any scientific unit to any other unit which is of the same type
Convert amount of money from type of currency to another. The foreign exchange rate is updated regularly. (The app needs internet connection to update forex rates)
